articles.author: Rob Picheta, CNN
articles.title: The US and Europe have finally reconnected, but they're moving in different directions on Covid-19 - CNN
articles.description: In September, when the White House announced its long-awaited plan to welcome vaccinated European travelers, the United States was consumed by a Covid-19 surge that far outpaced Europe's.
articles.content: London (CNN)In September, when the White House announced its long-awaited plan to welcome vaccinated European travelers, the United States was consumed by a Covid-19 surge that far outpaced Europe's.… [+7957 chars]

articles.title: EU readies Belarus sanctions as migrants try to breach Polish border - Reuters
articles.description: Migrants trapped in Belarus made multiple attempts to force their way into Poland overnight, Warsaw said on Wednesday, announcing that it had reinforced the border as the European Union prepares to impose sanctions on Belarus over the crisis.
articles.content: SUPRASL, Poland, Nov 10 (Reuters) - Migrants trapped in Belarus made multiple attempts to force their way into Poland overnight, Warsaw said on Wednesday, announcing that it had reinforced the border… [+5178 chars]

articles.title: Poland-Belarus border: Asylum-seekers trapped in Eastern Europe by Lukashenko's political chess game - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: An authoritarian Eastern European regime has steered thousands of people fleeing Iraq, Syria and Afghanistan to a frontier where it hopes to annoy its neighbours. Why?
